entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 2:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: SE 27 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Blowing snow early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 early this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 6.
